entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Nakusp
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:49 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Nakusp 12:00 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022
Temperature: -1.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 100 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -1.4°C
Wind: ESE 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Snow with periods of freezing rain near noon and with rain this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Periods of snow beginning late this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Temperature steady near minus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow becoming mixed with rain in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 cm. High plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022
